sentences.en: A salamander scurries into flame to be destroyed.
sentences.cn: 一成火焰蝾代人受过被毁坏.

sentences.en: But a salamander embryo can attract algae. Inside its tissues and cells.
sentences.cn: 但蝾螈胚胎却会吸引藻类进入组织和细胞。

sentences.en: Characters: Tadpoles, Chicks, Mother Hen, Shrimp, Frog, Salamander, Crab, Tortoise, Baby tortoise and Goldfish.
sentences.cn: 角色: 小蝌蚪们(2男2女), 小鸡们(1男1女),鸡妈妈, 虾爷爷, 青蛙, 蜥蜴, 螃蟹, 乌龟, 小乌龟和金鱼.

sentences.en: European cave - dwelling aquatic salamander with permanent external gills.
sentences.cn: 长有永久性外部鳃的欧洲穴居水栖蝾螈.

sentences.en: European salamander having dark skin with usually yellow spots.
sentences.cn: 黑色皮肤上通常有黄色斑点的欧洲蝾螈.

sentences.en: Groom for home at the same time giant salamander domesticates progenitive technology personnel.
sentences.cn: 同时为国内培训大鲵驯养繁殖技术人员.

sentences.en: Have you ever seen a giant salamander?
It vaguely resembles a giant salamander, with gray, scaly flesh and a long , slender fish tail.
sentences.cn: 它隐约看起来像一只巨型的蝾螈, 身体灰色, 长有鳞片,有一条鱼型的细长尾巴.

sentences.en: Moreover, there are signs that intracellular algae may be directly providing the products of photosynthesis — oxygen and carbohydrate — to the salamander cells that encapsulate them.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是，有迹象表明这种细胞内的水藻可以直接将光合作用的产物氧气和二氧化碳给容纳它的蝾螈细胞。

sentences.en: Q version salamander, which is a very Q screen version of the flight shooters Wang Yu!
sentences.cn: 版沙罗曼蛇, 这是一款画面很Q的飞行横版射击手游!

sentences.en: The giant salamander feeds largely on fish and shrimps.
sentences.cn: 食物主要以活鱼活虾为主.

sentences.en: Using imaging techniques and DNA testing, scientists found algae inside the cells of young salamander embryos—and even in the reproductive tracts of some adult females.
sentences.cn: 通过成像技术和基因检测，科学家发现了成活在幼年蝾螈胚胎细胞中的藻类——甚至存在于一些成年雌性的生殖道中。

sentences.en: Year design ability is raise giant salamander 8000 end, crop amounts to 20000 kilograms.
sentences.cn: 年设计能力为饲养大鲵8000尾, 产量达20000公斤.

words.tran_cn: 火蜥蜴；蝾螈目动物；耐火的人；烤箱

trans.tran_cn: 火蜥蜴，火怪，耐火的人，蝾螈（两栖动物，形似蜥蜴）
trans.tran_en: a small animal similar to a  lizard  , which lives on land and in the water
